post:
Got a server for a project, which wont go ahead.. but the server has been already purchased. 
Its not going to be used at all , so if anyone is up for a grab , drop me a line. 
The server is: [http://www.soyoustart.com/offres/sys-e32-1.xml](http://www.soyoustart.com/offres/sys-e32-1.xml)

> Processeur 	Intel Xeon E3 1225v2
> Cœurs / Threads 	4 cores / 4 threads
> Fréquence 	3.2 GHz+
> RAM 	32Go DDR3
> Disques 	2x 2 To SATA
> Raid 	Soft
> Connexion réseau 	1Gbps
> Bande passante 	200Mbps
> IPv4 	1
> IPv6 	/64

Its paid for a year ( TOTAL INCL. VAT 	£483.59) 
Willing to sell it , not to rent on per month basis. 
Drop me a line with reasonable offers. 
Thanks 
====
Ps. If that is not the right category to post , I do apologise.
